result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tom N Gbean

records.addlTxt: State handed over discovery. 9:00 AM Defendant Tom N Gbean in court, in custody.  Attorney Rebekah M Rennicke in court for State of Wisconsin.   Colloquy with DE regarding his right to Atty.  Court finds DE is waiving right to lawyer freely, voluntarily, and intelligently.
and Notice of DNA and Witness List (Plaintiff's)
1:50 PM Defendant Tom N Gbean in court.  Prosecuting attorney Robin W Lee in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Track with 22CM1330. Waiver of right to atty signed
Status conference on November 21, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Status conference on November 21, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Status conference on November 21, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Pre-trial conference on August 24, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with SJ. 
- Defendant shall not be on the Lakeshore Path. 
Trial Judge - Br 13

02:39 PM Defendant in court, in custody.  Thersa Louise Lewandowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant declined assistance of SPD Ronald Benavides. The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 24, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
